items.summary:

These newer charging solutions only hit the market back in August, with them usually going for $500 at full price. The few discounts we’ve seen have dropped costs to $450, $425, and a $400 low back during Black Friday. If you missed out on that low, you can pick up either model at the second-best pricing we have tracked, saving you $75.

items.title: Mammotion’s AI-supported YUKA 2000 robot lawn mower gives you back your time at $1,349 (Reg. $1,799)
items.summary:
Through its official Amazon storefront, Mammotion currently has its YUKA 2000 Robot Lawn Mower down at $1,349 shipped. Normally $1,799 without discounts, this robot has been keeping down at $1,349 since mid-December, with only a single day’s spike up to its full rate before dropping back down. This is a 25% markdown that has cut $450 off the going rate for the second-lowest price we have tracked, only beaten out by the $1,299 low that we last saw during Black Friday and Cyber Monday sales. You can also find three other models from this brand benefitting from up to 35% savings here.

items.title: UStrive security lapse exposed personal data of its users, including children

items.title: EcoFlow flash savings drops DELTA 3 Max power station back at second-best $749 (Reg. $1,199), more from $399
items.summary:
As part of its ongoing Disaster Winter Storm Sale, EcoFlow has launched another 48-hour flash sale that will continue through tomorrow, January 21, with up to 62% discounts on four offers – two being add-on accessory bundles and two being power stations. One notable price drop is the DELTA 3 Max Portable Power Station that is now back at $749 shipped, matching its Amazon pricing. Starting from $1,499 here and $1,199 at Amazon, we saw this same rate appear last week in a similar flash sale, with the price otherwise having been kept at $799 lately at Amazon. You’re getting another chance at the second-best price while these short-term savings last, saving you $450 off the going rate and $750 off the MSRP, which is only beaten out by the $699 low last seen during Cyber Monday. Head below to learn more about it and see the three other flash offers while they’re still around.
